item.title: QRP 40m-10m UnUnTenna
item.description: 40m-10m UnUnTenna Kit from Aliexpress These kits are sold on Aliexpress and Ebay and at the time of wiring they are about $15.35 USD shipped. QRPGuys 40m-10m UnUnTenna

item.title: Cqrlog
item.description: CQRLOG GUI logger app build with Lazarus and FreePascal. Primary platform: Linux + MySQL.

item.title: QRP Antenna Tuner
item.description: DIY kit from Aliexpress or Ebay These kits are sold on Aliexpress and Ebay and at the time of wiring they are about $13 USD shipped. Roots of this tuner can be traced to a QRP console designed by Doug DeMaw featured in the QST article: “A QRP Console” Doug DeMaw, QST, Sept. 1970, p. 23-25. SWR indicator used in this tuner is based on Dan Tayloe design: SWR Indicator Bridge Kit N7VE LED SWR Bridge Manual LED SWR Schematic Tuner is using a hig-pass T-network to match low input impedance (Z) to a high output Z.

item.title: Tlf Logger
item.description: TLF a Linux based ham radio contest logger TLF is a curses based console mode general logging and contest program for amateur radio: https://tlf.github.io/
